A

AndroidOmapiPlugin - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.omapi
Loads and configures AndroidOmapiReader for each SE Reader in the platform TODO : filters readers to load by parameters with a regex
AndroidOmapiReader - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.omapi
Communicates with Android readers throught the Open Mobile API see Reader Instances of this class represent SE readers supported by this device.
AndroidOmapiReader(String, Reader, String) - Constructor for class org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.omapi.AndroidOmapiReader
